[h1]I've been playing Dead By Daylight since the beginning...[/h1]
And I can say that I cried, laughed and screamed A LOT because of lovely or crappy teammates, tunneler and camper killers and pretty bugs which let you get stuck into a hill. 
But...

[h1]This game developed so fast and so well! [/h1]
It started with a quite simple idea and now it became a huge game with a lot of content and different characters.
The graphics are really good looking, especially after the update. Cannot wait until the next maps get a rework.
Also it is worth having a look at the trailers for each new chapter. I got the feeling that there's always put much effort and work in it. I appreciate that so much!

Positive: 
+great graphics and animations (except of the hook, always hanging somewhere else than in the chest :D )
+a lot of content, stories (texts, little clips), individual characters
+licensed killer and survivors for a thrilling gameplay (Michael Myers (Halloween), Ghost face (Scream) etc.)
+lots of maps, so every game is kind of special
+survival with friends - so you don't have to die all alone
+more and more content upcoming such as the rift, for story telling about each character

Negative:
-I have a very special, personal bug, the support never managed to help me to get away from
-sometimes you can have really bad rounds, tunnelers and campers, but that's not the game's fault

So, [h1]May the odds be ever in your favor. [/h1]- no wait, wrong movie. :D
